text:
56，（叮叮叮叮）感谢XXX买了我们的XX瓦灯泡，其他哥哥姐姐抓紧买，我们的优惠库存不多了
57，（叮叮叮叮）感谢XXX买了我们的XX瓦灯泡，其他哥哥姐姐抓紧买，我们的优惠时间不多了
【新增】（自问自答）
58， 有的哥哥姐姐在问，想看68瓦的灯泡是吗？ 好的，我马上给你展示一下
trans:
56. (Ding Ding Ding Ding) Thank you, XXX, for purchasing our XX-watt light bulb! Brothers and sisters, hurry and grab yours—our discounted stock is running low!
57. (Ding Ding Ding Ding) Thank you, XXX, for buying our XX-watt light bulb! Brothers and sisters, don’t miss out—the special offer is ending soon!
[New] (Self-answered question)
58. Some brothers and sisters are asking about the 68-watt light bulb. Let me show you right away!
